title: Sri Lanka eyes 1358MW of ground solar power plants
byline: Some of the plants are awarded and is expected to come on stream by end 2026

title: Sri Lanka foreign exchange reserves slightly up in Feb 2025
byline: In January the excess liquidity was withdrawn amid a reduction in private credit

title: Sri Lanka doctor under surveillance in East denies extremism charges
byline: Sri Lanka government has said defence agencies are vigilant over Eastern groups

title: Japan re-schedules Yen loans to Sri Lanka till 2042 at below 1-pct
byline: Accrued interest from January 01, 2023 to December 31, 2023, will be paid on July 05, 2025
